::Shadow Wing::

She moved the bot back to it's resting position on the table.  It lay 
there while she tried a new connection to it's optics.  She went 
through the optic connections from where she was up through the 
central brain stem and routed through the cranial connections to the 
optics.  This time, it started to work.  She could see, like looking 
through extremely blurry bionoculars.  She found the small connection 
to the vocal box inside the protoform's throat.  She tried to make it 
speak, but only a few squeeks and some hushed  muttering came out.  
It was going to take time to get the voice to work, but she had 
nothing but time on her hands as far as she was concerned.
